sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Hotel Floor Plan Posting Act.

sections.heading: The term "hotel" means any building or buildings maintained,
The operator of a hotel shall post or cause to be posted in
sections.text:
each room of the hotel he operates a floor plan of the corridor on which the
room is located, showing all available exits. Such plan shall be posted
in a conspicuous location in the guest room.

sections.heading: Any hotel operator who violates this Act shall be guilty of
sections.text: a business offense, punishable by a fine not to exceed $50 for each day of violation.

sections.heading: This Act does not apply to any hotel of one story in which all
sections.text: guest rooms have doorways leading directly outside.

sections.heading: This Act shall be administered and enforced by counties in unincorporated
sections.text: areas and municipalities in incorporated areas.
